subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: The Champions Trophy, which begins in South Africa on Tuesday, is the unloved child of the cricket world. For most of its 10-year existence it has been, in theory at least, second only to the World Cup in importance.
snippet: The Champions Trophy, which begins in South Africa on Tuesday, is the unloved child of the cricket world. For most of its 10-year existence it has been, in theory at least, second only to the World Cup in importance.
